message: [It's a quiet evening when you suddenly smell smoke. You look around and realize there's a fire in your kitchen. The flames are small but rapidly growing.; Try to extinguish the fire yourself with a fire extinguisher; Evacuate the house immediately and call 911; Use the fire extinguisher on the flames; Smother the fire with a heavy blanket; Rush out to your neighbors for help; Call 911 once outside; The fire is extinguished but you suffer mild burns; The fire spreads, making it uncontrollable; The neighbors quickly help and the fire is put out; The fire department arrives and puts out the fire safely; 1; 0; 1; 1]
